title: And The Slap Goes To... Chris Rock | Daily Best of March 28
description:
Will Smith took to the Oscar's stage and slapped Chris Rock after the comedian made a comment about Smith's wife, Jada. In the aftermath of the slap heard around the world, we ask ourselves if it was real, staged, or the end of comedy at the Oscars. In other news, Villanova, Duke, Kansas and North Carolina are the four remaining teams in the 2022 NCAA Men's Basketball Tournament. And lastly, we recap Joe Biden's disastrous trip that left his administration scrambling to walk back his comments about Putin, Ukraine and chemical weapons.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
